      static double getDistance(double lat1, double lat2, double long1, double long2)
      gets distance in kilometers from two latitude/longitude points by using the haversine formula : https://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html Adapted from javascript code

      static double getPrice(double basePrice, double multiplier, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng pickup, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng destination)
      gets the recommended fare price using formula basePrice + multiplier * distance between points
